paragraph: Call us now for a consultation.

detailsData.title: Experienced Employment Lawyers
detailsData.content: Decades of experience litigating cases for employees and victims of sexual harassment.

detailsData.title: Exclusive Plaintiff Representation
detailsData.content: Dedicated to representing plaintiffs or victims, never the perpetrators.

detailsData.title: Focus on Client Advocacy
detailsData.content: Passionate and relentless in fighting for employee rights and justice.

address: 523 W. 6th Street, Suite 707, Los Angeles, CA 90014
valueProp: The Genie Harrison Law Firm is dedicated to advocating for those who have been wronged or harmed, striving to help them recover and resolve their issues.
CTA: When the worst happens, call the best.
